pageTextData.title: This app displays three Coca Cola brands with 3D models.
pageTextData.mainImage: Photo by Lucas Santos on Unsplash: https://unsplash.com/photos/JKaKXJOIdeM

pageTextData.title: Coca Cola
pageTextData.description: Coca Cola Original Taste is the worlds favourite soft drink and has been enjoyed since 1886. You can find Coca Cola Original Taste in a variety of sizes to suit every lifestyle and occasion.

pageTextData.title: Oasis
pageTextData.description: Oasis is a great tasting refreshing still drink made across seven delicious flavours.

pageTextData.title: Fanta
pageTextData.description: Bright, bubbly, instantly refreshing and great tasting. Fanta Orange is made with 100% natural flavours, fruit juice and is caffeine free.

pageTextData.galleryDescription: These are Images of each of the 3D models.

pageTextData.CameraDescription: Use these to select different viewpoints of the models.

pageTextData.AnimationDescription: Use this to animate the models.

pageTextData.RenderDescription: Use this to control lights and rendering options.
